lead_paragraph: A former nun leaves the convent to become a governess for the seven children of a wealthy, Austrian widower who has grown into a cold disciplinarian.  Soon, the she opens the children to the wonders of life and the joy of music - and eventually softens the heart of their father and gains his love.
